full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN GYI BSDUS DON RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,'DIR 'BAD DGE BA RAB DKAR CI YOD DES, ,LAM BZANG 'DIR NAM YANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,NAM MKHA'I MTHAS GTUGS GYUR BA'I 'GRO BA RNAMS, ,THEG MCHOG BGROD PA'I THEM SKAS 'DZEG GYUR CIG , ,,MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN GYI BSDUS DON, RIN CHEN PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG MANG DU MKHYEN PA'I SDOM BRTZON DU MAS BSKUL ZHING, KHYAD PAR DU YANG, MTSO STON DKA' BZHI PA SANGS RGYAS 'PHEL GYIS LAS DANG PO LA 'JUG PA BDE BA'I YAN LAG TU GYIS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, RIGS PA SMRA BA DAR MA RIN CHEN GYIS 'BROG RI BO CHE DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON SDO SNOD 'DZIN PA RIN CHEN CHOS RGYAL LO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG ,,AOm SVA STI, RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI GSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR KUN DGA' CHOS GLING DU, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,
